The Exiled kalphite paragon is a monster that resides in the Exiled Kalphite Hive. Similar to the stronger Exiled kalphite marauders, they attack with magic and do not have non-exiled counterparts in the Kalphite Hive. They can poison players.

Achievements[edit | edit source]

  • Ludikeris ( 15) – Kill a scarab mage, locust rider or kalphite with the Keris dagger.
